turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I would like to order a couple pizzas from the new pizzeria Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: two two medium pizzas, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what toppings do you want on them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a barbecue chicken pizza with jalapenos, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: on both?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: on both.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just the barbecue chicken pizza with jalapenos with jalapenos added please with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what type of crust?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Original.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 medium pizzas. chicken bbq with jalapeños and extra cheese. is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just one, please. And then I'll have a pizza of a different type.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure... and what is the topping you want on the second one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do Bella Luna have a special pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no, they don't have a special pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Well, I'll have a pizza. And I'll have pepperoni, mushrooms, onions, black olives, green peppers, tomatoes, and mozzarella, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 medium pizzas. one with chicken bbq with jalapeños and extra cheese. the other with pepperoni, mushroom, onions, black olives, tomatoes and mozzarella. correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Extra cheese on that as well, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, adding extra cheese. anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That would be all, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total is $36.90.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at bela luna's soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fantastic. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome, bye!
